data.name: ForgotPasswordSuccess
data.value: You'll receive an e-mail address {0} with a confirmation link.

data.name: RecoveryPasswordSuccess
data.value: The password is changed successfully.

data.name: RegisterSuccess
data.value: Registration was successful. Of that e-mail address {0} will receive a confirmation link, which can activate your account.

data.name: ValidationActivationConfirmPasswordInvalid
data.value: The fields "Password" and "Password again" do not match.

data.name: ValidationActivationConfirmPasswordRequired
data.value: The field "Password again" is required.

data.name: ValidationActivationPasswordInvalid
data.value: The field "Password" must contain at least 8 symbols.

data.name: ValidationActivationPasswordRequired
data.value: The field "Password" is required.

data.name: ValidationConfirmPasswordInvalid
data.value: The fields "New password" and "Enter the new password again" do not match.

data.name: ValidationConfirmPasswordRequired
data.value: The field "Enter the new password again" is required.

data.name: ValidationEmailForgottenInvalid
data.value: The field "Username" is invalid.

data.name: ValidationEmailForgottenRequired
data.value: The field "Username" is required.

data.name: ValidationEmailInvalid
data.value: The field "Username" containing your email address is invalid.

data.name: ValidationEmailLength
data.value: The field "Username" cannot contain more than 100 symbols.

data.name: ValidationEmailRequired
data.value: The field "Username" containing your email address is required.

data.name: ValidationFirstNameLength
data.value: The field "First name" cannot contain more than 100 symbols.

data.name: ValidationFirstNameRequired
data.value: The field "First name" is required.

data.name: ValidationLastNameLength
data.value: The field "Last name" cannot contain more than 100 symbols.

data.name: ValidationLastNameRequired
data.value: The field "Last name" is required.

data.name: ValidationNameRequired
data.value: The field "Name" is required.

data.name: ValidationOldPasswordRequired
data.value: The field "Old password" is required.

data.name: ValidationPasswordInvalid
data.value: The field "New password" must contain at least 6 symbols.

data.name: ValidationPasswordLength
data.value: The field "Password" cannot contain more than 100 symbols.

data.name: ValidationPasswordRequired
data.value: The field "New password" is required.

data.name: ValidationPasswordSymbols
data.value: The password must contain at least eight characters, with at least two of them must be: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and special characters. Example: Pr0gr@m1.

data.name: ValidationPhoneInvalid
data.value: The field "Telephone" is not required, but can contain only digits, spaces and the symbol "+" and must not be bigger than 50 symbols in length.

data.name: ValidationPhoneLengthInvalid
data.value: The field "Telephone" cannot contain more than 50 symbols.

data.name: ValidationUserInvalid
data.value: The field "Username" containing your email address is invalid.

data.name: ValidationUserRequired
data.value: The field "Username" containing your email address is required.
